website_summaries.verdict: While the Helix is far from a first-class paintball mask, the basic protection and comfort that this introductory model provides is a real bargain.
cons: This is not a thermal lens
Black is the only color available

customer_reviews.title: Weird. Save for an i4
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so this thing is great, never fogs, protects you, and is super durable. BUT, it feels like someone is squeezing my nose when I wear it. I cut out the foam in the nose section and now it's rediculously comfortable and I forget it's there.
customer_reviews.author: nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: decent starter facemask
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent facemask for about $30, but spend a bit more and get the true anti-fog or dual thermal lense mask. placed in the rain and humid conditions and this mask will fog up. in any other condition, it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ktran

customer_reviews.title: have a thermal lens and fit nicely. They bottom of the mask is a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap, have a thermal lens and fit nicely. The bottom of the mask is a bit short leaving a bit of the sides of the face exposed, but time will tell how this all works out. I was sweating a lot, dripping inside the mask, A LOT, and not once did they fog up. Played all day in the sun in 80 degree weather and it was pretty hot in the mask, but considering all that, it was as clear as can be. Took a head shot and had to wipe it off, but again, it was clear and without fog. Best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fog proof
customer_reviews.text: This mask has been in my use for two years. It has been shot, dropped, thrown, squished a bit, and also saved my face from a rock when I tripped and fell. The construction is solid, no cracks. The lens out performs a lot of my friends' masks that were bought and advertised as "fog proof." Everyone was amazed that I got this mask from Amazon, and this mask continues to serve me well! I painted my mask with red decorations with model paint. Now it's truly my mask.
customer_reviews.author: Delta

customer_reviews.title: Great lens, Basic mask
customer_reviews.text: I saw in a video that this product was a great lens in a basic mask. That phrase really holds up in this case. The lens won't fog up but the foam and rubber won't keep you comfortable either. If you're tired of renting masks and are looking for something cheap this is the way to go. If you'll be playing every weekend and want to stay comfortable I would recommend the JT flex 8 mask. Still a great lens though.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Frymire

customer_reviews.title: Good mask for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good mask for the price. I'm just now getting back into paintball and this mask is about on par with field rental masks (minus the thermal/replaceable lens). It is an Empire product so I don't expect any problems from it, so again, for the price it's a solid first mask to add to your collection but will probably move up not too long after if you stay into the sport.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent starter mask or as an improvement on cheaper options
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear lense, full face protection. Anti fog thermal lense works as expected. Excellent starter mask or as an improvement on cheaper options. Cushion on inside that sits against the skin is comfortable and plenty of padding. Bought two more for friends. Would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad mask but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask when I was going on a paintball trip as opposed to using the rental ones. I am an average sized man in his late 20s and it fits me well. My only major gripe is that the forehead piece is made of a rubber that is rather flimsy causing it to detach from the mask quite often. This requires the mask to be removed to fix which is not exactly an option in the midst of paint filled warfare.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mask for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is light weight and more importantly it does not fog! Also for us people with glasses it fits over them no problem and even the thicker frames. I bought a cheaper empire mask not knowing anything about paintball yet. First time I went out it fogged up and couldn't see a single thing the entire time. I did my research when I got home and decided to try this. Next weekend I went out again and I could actually see! Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.author: ccreech

customer_reviews.title: I was quite disappointed with how fast that happened
customer_reviews.text: Finally went to the field to test these out, after maybe seven games the mask started to fog up quite heavily. I was quite disappointed with how fast that happened, even with the anti-fog spray the field provides. I'll be looking for a different and hopefully better mask.
customer_reviews.author: Palmer

customer_reviews.title: great mask for great price
customer_reviews.text: I dont get why people spend 100+ for a mask....for foam?? for cool colors? really? This mask has a thermal lens and protects your face. 'Nuff said. It comes with a chin strap which I unhooked and used for something else...... ....I put on a contour roam helmet cam and its badass! Used the chin strap to secure it in place even more. awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kapitalist

customer_reviews.title: Decent Mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask after looking around in shops & online. This is the best mask you I've found for the price. The dual pane lense prevents fogging completely. I live & play in Georgia where it's really humid & haven't fogged up since I started using this mask. It hasn't scratched or given me any visual restrictions, isn't too heavy, & I can communicate with my team mates during the games. There are a lot of replacement lense options also, for when the time comes.You can spend a lot more money on a mask that will serve the same purpose. . . . ,but why!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: I've bought 6 of these!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome budget helmet! The fact that's got the thermal lens for the price that you pay is fantastic! I've used this mask when it's been humid, I've used it in rain, I've used it in cold and hot days as well; Everytime I've had zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Zeid

customer_reviews.title: Great for a casual player
customer_reviews.text: Mask fit well. No issues with lenses fogging on a warm (87 degree F) Florida spring day. Perfect for a casual player like myself. Price was right.
customer_reviews.author: JMc

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money. Have to contour the foam yourself
customer_reviews.text: The mask fits well and doesnt fog. Only con is the stripping inside pinches your nose shut. BUT you can sand a contour into it with very little effort. Glasses users may want to shave the inner nose section down a bit. If you dont it may shove the glasses onto your skull and get uncomfortable fast.
customer_reviews.author: K-roll

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandson. His request and I have heard no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis J. Seaton

customer_reviews.title: Fogging problem solved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because I had problems with constant fogging. Paintball isn't as much fun when you can't see. However, it is fun when you are the only one who can see!. These worked as hoped for.. 2 1/2 hours of heavy panting and no fogging. And they are pretty comfortable. Happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Garyyds

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ok so the only thing I have a issue with on this mask is that it's not as comfortable as the high priced masks. Now when it comes to performance this mask is amazing the thermal lens work perfectly I play in miami fl so it's hot and humid no fog after multiple hours of play I recommend getting a headband to wear cause once I put one on the mask felt comfortable to me. Also bring some good rags and water cause paintballs will smear when you try and wipe it off
customer_reviews.author: christian

customer_reviews.title: Not as many vents
customer_reviews.text: There aren't any vents on the jawline. There also aren't nearly as many in the mouth As the one in the picture Doesn't fog though
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: not the same mask in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it had good reviews and because the mask had tons of holes on it making it breathable but when I got it. It wasn't the one they have pictured but another one.....
customer_reviews.author: Linda P Le

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the mask you want if you need glasses and or have larger frames then most or if you want to be a bad mother trucker a
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this mask I was worried if it would fit with my glasses. I have fairly large sized glasses. When I got this and put it on I was immediately impressed with how well it fit. Definitely the mask you want if you need glasses and or have larger frames then most or if you want to be a bad mother trucker and wear sunglasses with the mask
customer_reviews.author: Cory jay bloom

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This mask for the money is perfect. Item arrived 1 day ahead of schedule. Looks, feels and fits great on my noggin. Never had a chance to test the anti fog claim. When masked arrived I custom fit a cooling fan on top of the vent holes and powered it with a 1s lipo battery.
customer_reviews.author: C. Good

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: Good deal, nice helmet. worth not having to use the ones supplied at paint ball range. worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: these goggles are great and work well
customer_reviews.text: i am a beginner paintballer and bought these goggles. these goggles are great and work well! it does not show in pic but they have an extremely comfortable chin strap. also it has a little bit of gel like material on the strap that keeps it fitting comfortably. very breathable and does not fog up. would reccomend this mask to anybody that wants good quality for a cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: My son was thrilled to get this for Christmas! ...
customer_reviews.text: My son was thrilled to get this for Christmas! it is very well made and it is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Its the best you can get at its price range. The foam isn't comfortable but the shape of the mask fits nicely for protection and never fogged during my intensive game
customer_reviews.author: justin pyktel

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. They work perfectly. The fit is a bit tight on my huuuuuge melon of a head, but for the most part were comfortable for 3 hours stretches at a time. No fogging!
customer_reviews.author: Josh K

customer_reviews.title: it sits comfortably on my face (for a $30 price tag) and ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, u can't go wrong with t his mask. it sits comfortably on my face (for a $30 price tag) and DOES NOT fog up. Lens is replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: YT

customer_reviews.title: Don't need a $130 mask.
customer_reviews.text: Super stoked on this mask. If you're just starting out. This is a great mask for the price. All I did was change to a mirrored lens and it looks angry as hell. Granted its not as comfortable as a Dye, it's $100 cheaper. The mask doesn't make the P-balling. But you can always upgrade later if you want.
customer_reviews.author: The Tudd

customer_reviews.title: it seems to be a good mask but it's not the one that I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The mask pictured is not the one you receive.it seems to be a good mask but it's not the one that I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: jeff baker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these goggles comfortable and easy to put on, but they are also excellent at staying fog-free. The mask does its job of both protecting your face and circulating air seamlessly. I highly recommend these to anyone looking to buy paintball goggles, especially those of you who are tired of renting cheap, almost-unusable goggles. Seriously guys. STOP RENTING AND GET YOURSELF A PAIR.
customer_reviews.author: Chan Kyu Park

customer_reviews.title: I'm not an avid paintballer, but all I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an avid paintballer, but all I was looking for was a mask that was well made and didn't fog up, ever. SUCCESS!
customer_reviews.author: McSneakerson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people with glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Alright, this mask is perfect for people who wear eye glasses. I've had 3 of my friends try this mask on, all who wear different size eye glasses and all of them say there is no pressure on your glasses from the sides or the front. I was also able to easily mount a gopro onto the visor, but I would recommend moving it further to the back of the visor then where I have it, as the visor wobbles a lit with the wait of the gopro.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Schnickels

customer_reviews.title: I do not feel like the mask will fall off while maneuvering making it ...
customer_reviews.text: Mask has fogged while I have worn it between temperatures of 80*F to 35*F. Fits well on my head. I do not feel like the mask will fall off while maneuvering making it one less item that I need to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear for 10 year old and adult. Some fogging but temperature was 85 degrees. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Not the mask in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product TWICE and both times it came as the wrong one. I received an empire helix mask but it is a different type and does not have the holes on the sides. Its safe to say you probably wont get the mask in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Solid value in a fog-proof mask!
customer_reviews.text: See my comment for the Olive-colored version of this mask. I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: S. McClain

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mask, fits well, easy to clean, and the lens is replaceable if you want an upgrade. The lens is a great anti fog lens for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wore 2 days for training and did not fog up in warm humid conditions
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ezell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: no fog. chin strap really helps keep the mask from bouncing
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: No fog Even on blazing hot days!
customer_reviews.text: Best and first investment for any paintball lover! No more fogged lenses. Very Comfortable! There's no way that you'll be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: FRod

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought over a year ago and still a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: Tested out
customer_reviews.text: I went to an indoor field to test this mask out and it definitely doesn't fog up on the lens. Only thing with it I can see is the smearing/smudges that doesn't easily come off with a cloth. No complaint. Mask works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kearce

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: this mask is extremely good for the price.i played with it and it didnt fog once.i am very pleased with it.the only thing is is that it has sort of a 'cheap' feeling to it. it is also extremely easy to take apart
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: For the price, this mask rules!
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable, doesn't fog up while running and gunning, and cheap. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Taterguy

customer_reviews.title: Best mask for the $$$. Period.
customer_reviews.text: Check review on PBREVIEW [...] for evidence of the same, this mask is far and away the best paintball mask for the money. Does not fog (one of the few lower priced masks with thermal/dual paned goggles,) and basically indistinguishable from its $90 plus cousin, the Empire Vents Avatars (see same reviews). Very comfortable. Why pay 3X more for the same performance? This mask is legendary for its price/performance ratio. I actually own more than one pair...
customer_reviews.author: Ralph R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great mask! Haven't had it fog up even on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mask! Haven't had it fog up even on a muggy day in the woods. It does however scratch very easily.
customer_reviews.author: James Prather

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The received mask does not have the grooves of the motive image.
customer_reviews.author: javier ordoñez

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, didn't fog at all (55 degrees)
customer_reviews.text: Fit well on my big head, comfortable, didn't fog at all (55 degrees).
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these and both have not fogged at all! Best one here for your moneys worth!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Molina

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great mask for the price...good air flow and vision. Only issue I have is what many others have stated and that's the uncomfortable padding inside of the mask. Overall I would recommend this mask to anyone who is shopping on a budget
customer_reviews.author: Drexel Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have used it 3 times, has never fogged.. Good protection, very comfortable.. If you are going for mid-level this is the one
customer_reviews.author: Pablo G.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best mask I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Never fogs. This is the best mask I've ever used. Even the $100 dye mask fogs up, but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: yes!
customer_reviews.text: Great mask for the price, alil harder than I had hoped but its perfect and it fits over my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Garner

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good mask. It fits really good and looks cool
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good mask. It fits really good and looks cool. It came on time too. It does not fog up. This mask it worth the price
customer_reviews.author: tyler roberts

customer_reviews.title: Its okay, but you are probably better off with something else
customer_reviews.text: Well, it certainly protected my face for the airsofting purpose I used it for. But ultimately I had fogging issues. Even without the fogging, I felt like I lacked some visibility which I now have using goggles and a mesh face mask. So for me, its difficult to recommend the product but I can see how it may work for some people. It also seems to be decently built so that's a good thing as well thus why I rated it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brett O.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast and hassle free. Item slightly different from picture , not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Michael Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Needed a basic mask to get the job done. Works well, and does not really fog up.
customer_reviews.author: Razor1369

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Never fogs up on the field during rain or snow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best mask on the market for $35. Fits great, easy to care for, DOESN'T FOG!
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: DIFFERENT FROM PICTURES
customer_reviews.text: Looks different in person then it does in pictures does not have the side vent holes on the cheeks
customer_reviews.author: brash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product. I had no fog problem during the game.
customer_reviews.author: V. KARACA

customer_reviews.title: Reliable goggles
customer_reviews.text: I bought two goggles,they are very good for their price,they don't fog very reliable,looking forward to using them again, i recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Copertino

customer_reviews.title: good mask i like it but it scratches a little on your face
customer_reviews.text: amazing mask, only bad thing is the foam kinda scratches you, but overall it is a good mask, recommend it for beginners
customer_reviews.author: denise b

customer_reviews.title: blue tint is cool
customer_reviews.text: mask is a 5 out of 10 in comfort. its hard cover make paint hits virtually non existing unless it hits googles
customer_reviews.author: ricardo r barraza

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: One time out so far and the mask never fogged once. For 1/3 the price of high end masks you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Baker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mask feels good and has a good price
customer_reviews.author: Keoni Hoxie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mask for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product is great right out of the box. Removed the film, breathed on the inside of this mask for a solid 2 minutes, no fog. AT ALL. And just incase it did fog, I bought FogTech. So far so good, and I find it very comfortable, even if you wear glasses. Great product, definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Not the mask shown in photo.
customer_reviews.text: Apparently there are two versions of the Empire Helix Thermal mask, the one pictured, and the one that was sent. The one I received is smaller in the chin and cheek areas, is missing a row of vent holes in the front, is missing the cheek vents,and has smaller ear protectors. The one that was shipped does not match the sales photo and seems smaller and cheaper than the one pictured. Not thrilled that I had to send back to WaveToGo and pay for the shipping which came out to 32% of the original purchase price, but lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: NapalmNick

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mask for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty well, and I have a small face. Came in right on time and in perfect condition. Includes a manual on how to change out the lenses and take care of the mask. I can't wait to use it on my upcoming paintball trip!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and easy to breathe through.
customer_reviews.text: I have a large head, but this product fit well. No fogging, good visibility, and easy to breathe through. Didn't mind leaving it on between games.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great gun, barrel leak, going to return.
customer_reviews.text: Gun is amazing, I love the design and almost everything about it. Sadly, there is a barrel leak and I will be returning the item. I will edit my review once I receive my new gun.
customer_reviews.author: Francis P.

product_meta.title: Empire Paintball Helix Thermal Lens Goggle
product_meta.description: Empire Paintball Helix Thermal Lens Goggle
feature_bullets: Grey and black Vents logo strap
